meanings.definition: To outlive or live longer than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother overlives all her friends.
meanings.sent2: The tortoise overlives the hare in the race.
meanings.sent3: The ancient tree overlives the new saplings around it.
meanings.sent4: Her memory overlives in the hearts of those who knew her.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the hero who overlives all challenges inspires us.

meanings.definition: To surpass in living or existence.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset overlives the darkness of night.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of fresh bread overlives any other smell in the bakery.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter overlives the sadness in the room.
meanings.sent5: The joy of the moment overlives any worries about the future.

meanings.definition: To continue to exist beyond a certain point.
meanings.sent1: The old ruins overlives the stories of the past.
meanings.sent2: The tradition of celebrating festivals overlives generations.
meanings.sent3: The old clock overlives its broken mechanism, still ticking.
meanings.sent4: His legacy overlives the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of the team overlives the challenges they face.
